summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5600 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 143, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley between Broadway and 10th Avenue, from East Columbia Street to East Marion Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 73720 as amended by Ordinance No. 73793, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
